Shares of Arconic Inc. ARNC, -1.17% jumped more than 7% in the extended session Tuesday after a Reuters report said that a deal with Apollo Global Management could be reached as early as next week.
Arconic earlier Tuesday reported third-quarter profit that beat estimates and raised its guidance for the year.
The private equity company would buy Arconic for more than $11 billion, according to the report.
Shares of Arconic ended the regular trading session up 2.5%.
